snippet: Wide receiver Larry Fitzgerald, an eight-time Pro Bowler, agreed to a restructured two-year contract to stay with Arizona, the Cardinals announced Wednesday.
abstract: Wide receiver Larry Fitzgerald signs restructured contract to stay with Arizona Cardinals; other football news noted.
lead_paragraph: Wide receiver Larry Fitzgerald, an eight-time Pro Bowler, agreed to a restructured two-year contract to stay with Arizona, the Cardinals announced Wednesday.

headline.main: Larry Fitzgerald Will Remain a Cardinal
